department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Purchase, delivery, and installation of category 6 office furnitures to the National Capital Region
description:
Public Works Government Services Canada’s (PWGSC) Real Property Branch, on behalf of its client Canadian Nuclear Safety Commission, has a requirement for the purchase, delivery and installation of category 6 office furniture to the National Capital Region.

AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time.

All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on October 16, 2023 by 2:00pm EDT.

All bids submitted after 2:00pm EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.





  The full Request for Bid (RFB) and attachments can only be accessed and downloaded when logged into your SAP Ariba account.

https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17553301
full_summary:
# Government Tender Notice

## EP076-240742 – Workspaces Category 6 Invitation to Tender

### Notice Information

* **Reference Number:** WS4207185018
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4207185018
* **Amendment Number:** 4
* **Publication Date:** 2023-09-26
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-10-18T14:00:00 (extended to 2023-10-16T14:00:00)
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-11-06

### Contract Details

* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Limited Tendering Reason:** Not Applicable
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), and others (see UNSPSC codes below)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** None
* **Regions of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR)

### Goods and Services Specifications

* **UNSPSC Codes:**
  * 56101504 - Chairs
  * 56101519 - Tables
  * 56101706 - Conferencing tables
  * 56111802 - Freestanding tables
  * 56112105 - Lounge seating
  * 56112109 - Benches
* **Description:** Category 6 office furniture for the National Capital Region (NCR)

### Additional Information

* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contact Information:**
  * Michelle Wong (SPAC/PSPC) - michelle.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
  * Phone: None
  * Fax: None
* **SAP Ariba Account:** Mandatory for accessing the full Request for Bid (RFB) and attachments
* **Notice URL:** https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17553301

### Note

* For the avoidance of doubt, the tender closing date has been extended to 2023-10-16T14:00:00. All bids submitted after this time will be considered non-responsive. Please consult the tender package for further information.
